Text.Page:
(Rida Elin speaks in a quiet voice.)

I have something to ask of you... Would you help me?

B... But only if you don't mind!
You sign for supporting Kaiator with Princess Rida and join the Federation by Commander Tamur's suggestion.

I came here to request support for Pora Elinu. But...with the war going on, I'm afraid that Kaiator might not be able to spare any aid.

Will you...come with me into the headquarters?"Of course I will."

Really? Thank you.

Not that this is meant as a compliment—just an observation—but you have every right to be welcomed in Kaiator.

The amani are brave warriors, with great honor. They would have to honor my request if it came from you.

Welcome to Kaiator!

You're the hero who saved Pora Elinu!

I can sense your bravery just from looking at you!

I've heard about the situation at Pora Elinu. You have my word: Pora Elinu has Kaiator's support."Thank you."

We're only able to offer our support at this point because the tide of battle against the argons is turning in our favor.

But we have one condition.

Kaiator needs a warrior to be its sword. A brave warrior...just like you.

I want you to fight the argons with us.

What do you say?

I can't wait to tell this to my people.

Pora Elinu still has a long road to recovery...but , you should stay in Kaiator, and fight for the greater good.

Just like you did for Pora Elinu.

Splendid! Tamur knows a warrior when he sees one!

Get out there and slaughter those argons!

I prepared something as a welcome gift! Talk to my deputy, Ukenul. He should have it ready by now.

! Thank you for joining our cause.

Now all you need is...yes, you'll need a flying mount."A flying mount?"

It can, indeed, yes. Go to the Transporation Hall and speak with Kunar.

He has one set aside for you.

Oops, sorry. With that weapon, I thought you were someone else.

My friend's sister uses something like that.

Hi, I'm Hasmina, from the Mysterium."You can call me ."

? Where did I hear that name before...? ...wait...! Yes!

I heard that a mercenary named single-handedly saved Pora Elinu! That was you!

So, you're involved in the Argon War, too?

If you're going to get your supplies, let me go with you!

I have some business there, too.

Thanks for the chat.

We won't have any time for this when we're on the battlefield.

It seems that there never will be an end to this war. I'm scared.

I'm afraid that I might not get vengeance for my sister."Maybe I can help you with that."

Thanks. That means a lot to me.

I hope we can fight side by side one day.

Oh, and if you happen to meet someone from the Moonlight mercenary, can you check if Syona is okay?

Syona's sister should be there. She'll know.

Just let me know if you have the chance.

Take care!

So many people have been asking for a flying mount today.

We're short on supplies, but I'm happy to support a soldier fighting against the argons.

Here! Take it! Oh. Ehh..."Is something wrong?"

I was supposed to save one for you, but...well, I gave away the last one.

A federation officer came through earlier and raided our stores for some big mission in Northern Arun. I don't know what's going on, but it seems bad.

But I can't send you off to battle with nothing!

I'll give you other supplies instead. And may Kaia give you strength!
